item.title: by these hands the light of science
item.description: the title of today’s blogpost is from a song from the dr. stone anime soundtrack, stylized in all caps as BY THESE HANDS, THE LIGHT OF SCIENCE. in the beginning of dr. stone, one of the big goals of the main characters is to invent a way of generating light without the need for fires. thus, they invent lightbulbs and on the way make use of electricity. ergo, the title.

item.title: light writing
item.description: people talk about light reading. light novels. but light writing? never heard of that in my life. i’ll say from my perspective, it’s fair to say that there are fewer writers than there are readers. it wouldn’t be a normal past-time, depending on what circles you run in, to consider actively “writing” a hobby. much less “light writing”, which is to draw a comparison between itself and “heavy writing”. which i guess could mean working on a book?

item.title: some of the things i wish i could say 2
item.description: this post originally contained a letter i wrote to a friend that i treated poorly who i wanted to make up with. the letter was meant to be an apology for my actions and a statement on how i’m working on changing for the better. out of cringe, i’m redacting it and leaving this message in its place. thanks for reading today’s post. i needed to do a bit of reflection it seems
